elements.title: 21-Day Survey
elements.text: Thank you for your participation in the study over the last 21 days. This survey is similar to your first assessment and  will take approximately 15 minutes to complete.
What would you change about the game-like tasks you completed?
What would you change about the questions you completed?
What do you recommend we give people feedback on after they complete the assessment?
What would you say to someone who was having trouble resisting the temptation to act in an unhealthy way in the moment?

elements.title: Thank you for completing the different games for the last 21 days.
elements.text: Please complete all the games one after the other, like during your baseline assessment. When you finish with all the games, you will be asked a couple more questions about your experience before you finish.

elements.title: Thank you
elements.text: Please contact us to finalize your participation in the study. Upon hearing from you, we will schedule your payment and answer any questions or concerns that you may have.
